autoLevel.label: Auto Level
autoLevel.desc: Toggle whether to automatically adjust actor level based on talent count. Note: This is not perfectly accurate as it just counts total talents - 1.

autoInvest.label: Auto Investiture
autoInvest.desc: Toggle whether to automatically calculate and set investiture when taking a Radiant Path.

autoHealth.label: Auto Health
autoHealth.desc: Toggle whether to automatically calculate and set health based on level.

global.label: Currency Tracker (Global Override)
global.desc: Toggle whether to show the currency tracker in the equipment tab of the character sheet (Overrides client setting).

currencyBar.label: Currency Tracker
currencyBar.desc: Toggle whether to show the currency tracker in the equipment tab of the character sheet.

global.label: Encumbrance Tracker (Global Override)
global.desc: Toggle whether to show the encumbrance tracker in the equipment tab of the character sheet (Overrides client setting).

encumbranceBar.label: Encumbrance Tracker
encumbranceBar.desc: Toggle whether to show the encumbrance tracker in the equipment tab of the character sheet.

value.label: Level Value
value.desc: The level to set all player characters to.

toggle.label: Override Level Globally
toggle.desc: Toggle whether to override player character levels with the one specified below. Note: this will take precedent over the auto-level setting.

customSkills.label: Custom Skill
customSkills.desc: Allows you to add custom skills to the Cosmere RPG system.

customCurrency.label: Custom Currency
customCurrency.desc: Allows you to add custom currency to the Cosmere RPG system.

base.label: Base Unit
base.desc: Indicates this is used as the base unit for conversion rate.

image.label: Talent Image
image.desc: Opens the file browser to set an image.

append.label: Auto-Append
append.desc: Toggles auto-appending the substring ' (Talent Tree)' to the name of talents that lack it.
